A JSON with color names and itâ€™s values. Based on http:.w3.org/csswg/css-color/#named-colors.

[![NPM](https:.co/npm/color-name.png?mini=true)](https:.co/npm/color-name/)


```js
var colors = require('color-name');
colors.red [255,0,0]
```
